testcase.name: Testcase1 Contact page mandatory field validation
Testcase2 Successful submission of Contact page details
testcase.system-out: Given user connect to Jupitor Toys home page................................passed And from the home page go to contact page...................................passed And populate mandatory fields...............................................passed When click submit button....................................................passed Then validate successful submission message of Rajya........................passed And browser close...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Testcase3 Contact page error validation on mandatory fields by giving invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user connect to Jupitor Toys home page................................passed And from the home page go to contact page...................................passed When populate mandatory fields..............................................passed Then validate errors........................................................passed And browser close...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Testcase4 Verify shop page items in Cart
testcase.system-out: Given user connect to Jupitor Toys home page................................passed And from the home page go to shop page......................................passed When click buy button 2 times on Funny Cow..................................passed And click buy button 1 time on Fluffy Bunny.................................passed And click the cart menu.....................................................passed Then verify the items are in the cart.......................................passed And browser close...........................................................passed
